0: Drinks and food restaurants very expensive

The restaurants are over priced and mediocre we ate most of our meals elsewhere and bought groceries for most breakfasts and lunches at the Amigos grocery store down the street and saved a lot of money
You must eat at Passion if you want an amazing Puerto Rican dinner
We had dinner 2 times at Pasion and it was a long wait with bad cuatomer service since tip of 18 was included already
They would not even decorate the room with a folded towel for Honeymooners and would n’t even give a fruit platter or a bottle of champagne or something
They also have a free shuttle to take you to 2 restaurants off the the resort
You need to ride a small vehicle to get to and from the reservation desk and the pool areas and Restaurants or walk very long distances
It is extremely hard to escape to the good restaurants that Puerto Rico has on the beach
Breakfast cost 30 per person And I had an oatmeal
We went to the beach which was the size of a postage stamp and when we asked for a Pina colada we were told that was only available at the pool bar
1: The pool is exquisite the restaurants are wonderful and the beach area is natural and special
Restaurants covered every detail and were accommodating to any requests needs
The GM mentioned that they are adding even more amenities in 2020 with Top Golf a new sports bar concept a new gym and spa etc
The Italian restaurant food was decent with the views right on the ocean being the highlight
I also loved that they had board games in the club candy land scrabble zenga Yahtze etc which was super helpful on those two rainy days
Kids loved the shallow areas all around and adults enjoyed the swim up bar
The room had a fridge which was nice for snacks leftovers water and room made cocktails

We want to give a special mention to the chefs of both restaurants Gabriel Badilo and Angel Fernández that both went to our tables to make sure we enjoyed our meals and explained each one of our plates
The waiters in every restaurant were very nice and professional
The bar tenders were fun chatty and informative
